name: Health & Wellness Expo 2023
services: Health screenings, nutrition consultations, fitness workshops, mental health talks
professionals: Doctors, nutritionists, fitness trainers, mental health counselors
audience: All ages interested in health and wellness

name: Pediatric Health Fair
services: Pediatric check-ups, vaccination clinics, child nutrition guidance

name: Senior Health Awareness Camp
services: Geriatric screenings, fall prevention sessions, memory tests
professionals: Geriatric specialists, physical therapists, social workers

name: Women's Wellness Retreat
services: Women's health seminars, yoga and meditation sessions, spa treatments
audience: Women of all ages seeking holistic wellness

name: Diabetes Care Workshop
services: Diabetes screenings, dietary counseling, insulin administration training
audience: Individuals with diabetes and their families

name: Mental Health Symposium
services: Workshops on stress management, therapy dog sessions, panel discussions
audience: Individuals interested in mental health awareness
